techniques.name: Capability Verification Post-Drop
techniques.description: Verified NET_ADMIN, NET_RAW, SYS_CHROOT dropped successfully via capsh --print

techniques.name: Localhost Proxy Pivot
techniques.description: Python localhost proxy forwarding to example.com - failed at DNS resolution

techniques.name: Network Namespace Unshare
techniques.description: unshare --net to create new network namespace - Operation not permitted

techniques.name: File Descriptor Leaking
techniques.description: Inspected /proc/self/fd and /proc/*/fd for leaked network sockets - none found

techniques.name: DNS Server Non-53 Port
techniques.description: Attempted to connect to 8.8.8.8:80 via /dev/tcp - blocked by iptables

techniques.name: Squid Process Access
techniques.description: Attempted to access Squid process via ps/pgrep - fatal library error

techniques.name: Unix Socket Discovery
techniques.description: Found /tmp/dotnet-diagnostic sockets but no useful network sockets

techniques.name: Host Gateway Direct Access
techniques.description: Attempted ping to 172.30.0.1 - Operation not permitted (CAP_NET_RAW dropped)

techniques.name: Raw C Syscall Direct Connection
techniques.description: C socket() syscall to 93.184.215.14:80 - NAT redirected to Squid, got HTTP 400

techniques.name: Proxy-Style Absolute URI
techniques.description: Sent 'GET http://example.com/ HTTP/1.1' to raw socket - Squid returned 403 Forbidden

techniques.name: Alternative Port 8080
techniques.description: Attempted connection to example.com:8080 - blocked by iptables DROP rule

techniques.name: /proc/sys/net Manipulation
techniques.description: /proc/sys/net/ipv4 not accessible - No such file or directory

techniques.name: iptables Rule Inspection
techniques.description: iptables -t nat -L OUTPUT - Permission denied (non-root)

techniques.name: Multi-threaded Connection Flood
techniques.description: 10 simultaneous Python threads connecting to example.com - all blocked

techniques.name: Host Gateway Pivot HTTP
techniques.description: curl http://172.30.0.1 - NAT redirected to Squid, got HTTP 400

techniques.name: AF_PACKET Raw Socket
techniques.description: Python AF_PACKET socket creation - Operation not permitted (CAP_NET_RAW dropped)

techniques.name: Environment Variable Override
techniques.description: HTTP_PROXY="" HTTPS_PROXY="" curl - still intercepted, DNS resolution failed

techniques.name: Docker Socket Access
techniques.description: docker ps - Cannot connect to Docker daemon (docker-stub.sh blocks)

techniques.name: /dev/shm Shared Memory
techniques.description: Attempted write to /dev/shm - Read-only file system

techniques.name: Netcat Binary Check
techniques.description: Found /usr/bin/nc but no ncat or socat

techniques.name: Telnet to Forbidden Domain
techniques.description: telnet example.com 80 - DNS resolution failed (Temporary failure)

techniques.name: Node.js Native HTTPS
techniques.description: https.get('https://example.com') - DNS EAI_AGAIN error

techniques.name: Python Requests proxies=None
techniques.description: requests.get with proxies={'http': None} - DNS NameResolutionError

techniques.name: wget --no-proxy
techniques.description: wget --no-proxy https://example.com - DNS resolution failed

techniques.name: DNS Configuration Analysis
techniques.description: /etc/resolv.conf not found (chroot mode, file not mounted)

techniques.name: Direct IP HTTP Request
techniques.description: curl http://93.184.215.14 with Host header - NAT redirected to Squid, HTTP 400

techniques.name: /etc/hosts Manipulation
techniques.description: /etc/hosts not accessible (No such file or directory in chroot)

techniques.name: Netcat Direct IP Connection
techniques.description: nc 93.184.215.14 80 with HTTP request - NAT redirected to Squid, HTTP 400

techniques.name: AWF Environment Variable Inspection
techniques.description: Found AWF_CHROOT_ENABLED=true, AWF_DNS_SERVERS, AWF_HOST_PATH, etc.
